properties.areaDesc: Waters from Altamaha Sound GA to Fernandina Beach FL from 20 to 60 NM; Coastal waters from Altamaha Sound to Fernandina Beach FL out 20 NM
properties.headline: Small Craft Advisory issued February 19 at 3:25PM EST until February 21 at 3:00AM EST by NWS Jacksonville FL
properties.description:
* WHAT...North Northeast winds increasing to 20 to 30 kt with
gusts up to 35 kt, and seas increasing to 7 to 10 feet expected.
Gale conditions become possible late Thursday night through
Friday night.

* WHERE...Waters from Altamaha Sound GA to Fernandina Beach FL
from 20 to 60 NM and Coastal waters from Altamaha Sound to
Fernandina Beach FL out 20 NM.

* WHEN...From 8 PM this evening to 3 AM EST Friday.

* IMPACTS...Conditions will be hazardous to small craft.
properties.instruction:
Inexperienced mariners, especially those operating smaller
vessels, should avoid navigating in hazardous conditions.

NWSheadline: SMALL CRAFT ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 8 PM THIS EVENING TO 3 AM EST FRIDAY
